Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product offers unparalleled features and benefits that cater to your specific needs and expectations. Given its exceptional quality and versatility, I believe it would be an invaluable asset to you. I am offering this remarkable product to you at a special introductory price of $14995. I am confident that once you experience its capabilities, you will agree that this is an excellent investment. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further information. I look forward to the opportunity to serve you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $14,995. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $14,995
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
